text: phir agar munh pher len to (ai rasool) hamane tumako unaka nigehabaan banaakar nahin bheja tumhaara kaam to sirph (ehakaam ka) pahuncha dena hai aur jab ham insaan ko apanee rahamat ka maza chakhaate hain to vah usase khush ho jaata hai aur agar unako unheen ke haathon kee pahalee karatooton kee badaulat koee takaleeph pahunchatee (sab ehasaan bhool gae) beshak insaan bada naashukra hai
